EDAMError_3_User_active: Permission denied because user is inactive
EDAMError_3_User_tooManyFailuresTryAgain: Too many failed login attempts. Please try again later.
ExtensionDescription: Use the Evernote extension to save things you see on the web into your Evernote account.
articleClipFailure: Sorry, Evernote cannot clip this page as an article. Please select the portion you wish to clip.
authExpired: This application's access was revoked via the Evernote web service. Please re-enter your password.
authPersistenceError: Your browser's preferences conflict with the Evernote extension. Try restoring Chrome's Privacy Content settings to the defaults: Allow local data to be set and do NOT block third-party cookies. Consider disabling other 3rd party extensions.
checkVersionWarning: This version of Evernote Web Clipper is no longer compatible with Evernote Service. Please install the latest version.
closeWebClipper: Close Web Clipper or active panel
contextMenuPleaseLogin: You must sign in using the Clip To Evernote toolbar button before you can make clips
copyright:
Copyright 2009-2014 Evernote Corporation. All rights reserved.
Privacy Policy | Terms of Service
cyclePreviews: Cycle through sidebar preview one step down at a time
desktopNotification_clipProcessorSignInM: Invalid or expired authentication. Please sign in using the toolbar button, and try again.
desktopNotification_clipProcessorTooMany: The clip "$title$" has failed too many times and cannot be retried.
desktopNotification_unableToSaveClipUnkn: Unknown error occured while trying to save one of your clips. Error Message: $details$
emailLimitError: You cannot send more than $limit$ emails per day
expiredTwoStepCode: Login session expired. Please try again.
fleConclusionSubheader: Spread the word! Tell your family, friends and colleagues about the new Web Clipper.
fleMarkUpBody: Grab screenshots with a single click.
fleMarkUpToolsBody: Use markup tools to quickly and clearly communicate something to yourself as well as colleagues and friends. Use the arrow, highlighter and marker to focus on important text.
fleMarkUpToolsBody2:
The stamp tool offers a simple system to approve, reject or call out favorite content.
Blur sensitive information with the Pixelator tool. Draw attention to anything.
fleShareBody: Sharing your web clips couldn’t be easier.
fleShareCTA: Click the Share button in the sidebar and give it a try.
fleShareDialogBody: Once you’ve selected the format for your web clip (simplified articled, marked up article, etc.) you can share it in three ways: Post to social networks including Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn, grab the link to the web clip, or send via email.
fleWelcomeBody1: The new Web Clipper lets you clip, bookmark, screenshot, markup, and save content you come across online as well as easily and selectively share it with friends.
fleWelcomeBody2: For a cleaner reading experience online or in your Evernote account, use the Simplified Article view to remove unnecessary distractions from the page.
fleWelcomeCTA: Click Simplified Article to view, then save to your Evernote account if you wish.
fleWelcomeHeader: Get Started with the new Web Clipper
fleWelcomeSubheader: Clip and Markup Articles from the Web
foodTip: Discover great recipes and restaurants, and preserve your memorable food experiences with the Evernote Food mobile app.
fullPageClipFailure: Sorry, Evernote cannot clip this entire page. Please select the portion you wish to clip.
gaMessage: Enter the verification code displayed in your Google Authenticator app.
gmailError: You need to have a conversation selected to clip from Gmail.
gmailTooltip: You can now clip email threads from Gmail directly to your Evernote account.
illegalUrlClipFailure: Due to the restrictions set by the browser, you cannot clip this page
inactiveNudgeBody: Select any content on a webpage and then click the Web Clipper button in the toolbar to save it.
inactiveNudgeHeader: Clip important things with the Evernote Web Clipper
incorrectCode: The code you entered is incorrect.
legalNoticesTitle: Web Clipper uses the following open source software
loginForm_searchHelper: Show Related Results when you search the web
loginForm_usernameError_8: Username and password do not match existing user.
loginForm_usernameInvalidChinaError: Unknown login, or try Evernote International
loginForm_usernameInvalidError: No user with that name exists.
login_searchHelperLongDescription: When enabled, your searches on supported search engines will also be performed on your Evernote account.
nearQuotaFree: You have only 25% left. Go Premium and get 1GB of monthly upload capacity, 100MB note size and more.
nearQuotaPremium: You have only 25% left. Get an additional 1GB of monthly upload capacity.
newFeatureDescription: Web Clipper will suggest tags and notebooks based on the content of the clip. Manage this feature and other settings in the Web Clipper Options.
noteSizeExceededFree: You need Evernote Premium to save clips over 25MB in size.
notification_quotaExceededFree: You're out of space. Go Premium and get 1GB of monthly upload capacity, 100MB note size and more.
notification_quotaExceededPremium: You're out of space. Get an additional 1GB of monthly capacity.
options_clientSelectionDescription: On first use with this setting you will see an ‘External Protocol Request’ dialog. For best experience check the ‘Remember my choice’ checkbox and then ‘Launch Application’.
options_clipNotificationEnabledDescripti: When enabled, you will be notified whenever a clip has been uploaded. Notifications make it easier for you to view, edit, and share your clips.
options_clipStyleDescription: When enabled, clips will preserve styling information to look as close to the original page as possible. When disabled, clips will be given a simple style with plain text and no decoration.
options_eventLogDescription: The Activity Log contains a detailed list of the steps the Evernote application performs, as well as information about your account, your device and location information (if enabled). Your Note titles, tags, Notebook names and occasionally Note content also may be included. We treat your Activity Log data as confidential, and the terms of our Privacy Policy apply.
options_simulateSimplifiedChineseDescrip: When this options is enabled, the clipper will pretend to be set to the Simplified Chinese language for the purpose of choosing a service to connect to.
options_smartFilingBizDesc: Allow Smart Filing into Business Notebooks
options_smartFilingEnabledDescription: Smart Filing will automatically select a notebook and a list of tags for you based on the page you're clipping from.
options_storedCredentialsDescription: NOTE: Storing passwords may allow others to access your Evernote account when using this browser. Remove or sign out of the Clip to Evernote extension to permanently remove the username and password stored in your browser's extension.
options_useContextMenuDescription: When enabled, you can clip web pages via contextual menu. Right-clicking on images, selected text or anywhere on the page will reveal appropriate clipping options.
options_useSearchHelperDescription: Show Evernote content related to my web searches.
options_useStageDescription: Instructs the clipper to use the 'stage' service in place of the production service, which is normal only for testing.
panInstruction: Tip: Hold Ctrl while clicking to pan
pdfTip: Did you know that you can clip PDF's directly to your Evernote account with the Web Clipper?
popup_couldntStart: The Clipper couldn't start on this page. Reload the page and try again. If that doesn't help, contact customer support.
popup_loginCheckTimeout: Checking credentials took too long. Make sure you're connected to the internet and try again.
popup_unsupportedScheme: Clipping from this location is not supported.
rateQuestion: How would you rate this version of the Web Clipper?
ratingPromptBody: The new Web Clipper is designed to help you capture, save, markup and selectively share anything from the Web. Tell us how you like it.
ratingPromptHeader: How do you like the Web Clipper?
referralTipBody: When your friends get started with Evernote, we'll give you points to use toward Evernote Premium, increased monthly uploads, and more.
regAd: Save your ideas, things you like, things you hear, and things you see.
regForm_deactivated_username: Username has been deactivated. Would you like to reactivate the account?
regForm_email_required: Email address is a required field.
regForm_invalid_captcha: Type the numbers you see in the picture.
regForm_invalid_email: Email address appears to be invalid.
regForm_invalid_password: Select a password between 6 and 64 characters long consisting of letters, numbers and punctuation.
regForm_invalid_username: Your username must start and end with a letter or number, it can contain hyphens and underscores.
regForm_taken_email: This email address is already in use.
regForm_taken_username: The username you have selected is already in use by another user.
registration_terms: By clicking Register, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
relatedNotesDescription: Evernote finds up to three notes in your account that are related to the page you just clipped and presents them here.
salesforceBodyA: Quickly connect Evernote notes with Salesforce records, take detailed notes about customers, and gain new insights into the people you're connecting with.
salesforceBodyB: Share notes with colleagues, gain new insights into the people you're connecting with, and even link your notes directly to Salesforce records if you install the Evernote Business for Salesforce integration.
salesforceHeaderA: Do more with Evernote Business for Salesforce
screenshotCrosshairToast: Click to capture full screen or drag and release to capture a region
searchHelperLoginMessage: Sign in to Web Clipper to see Related Results
searchHelperNoTransportError: Simultaneous search is currently unavailable because evernote servers cannot be reached.
searchHelperNotesNotFoundBiz: No Related Results in your Personal or Business notes
searchHelperNotesNotFoundPers: No Related Results in your notes
searchHelperTopBizLibraryMatches: $num$ Related Results in your Business notes
searchHelperTopBizLibraryMatchesOne: 1 Related Result in your Business notes
searchHelperTopMatchesBiz: $num$ Related Results in your Personal notes
searchHelperTopMatchesBizOne: 1 Related Result in your Personal notes
setShortcutInstruction: To change - strike key combination on your keyboard now
shortcutLengthError: Shortcuts must be 3 or fewer keys in combination
shortcutNoEsc: Cannot use ESC in this shortcut
shortcutReleaseNotesBody: Visit the options page to learn and set your favorite shortcuts. Set the most important shortcut right now!
shortcutReleaseNotesTooltip: Place the cursor in the field and strike the shortcut you want to have
showSuccessfulClipDialogWithoutRelatedNo: Show successful clip dialog without Related notes
skitchTip: Draw shapes, arrows and quick sketches to get your point across with Skitch.
smsMessage: We sent a text message with a verification code to $phone$.
ssoDialog1Part1: You need to complete additional steps to access your Business's content.
ssoDialog1Part2: If you click Ignore, you will not be able to access Business content until you complete these steps. In the interim, you can continue to work with your Personal content.
ssoDialog2: You should be prompted to authenticate to your Business in a separate window. Please click 'Try Again' if this window does not open.
twoStepHelp: I need help getting a verification code
webClipperUpdated: See what's new in the Web Clipper
youHaveRelatedNotes: You have other notes like this.
